name: Dionel
description: An outstanding Marksman who makes a big difference under allied reinforcement and continuously deals massive AoE damage.

ultimate.name: Dawn Light
ultimate.description: Dionel soars into the air and cannot be targeted for 6s, during which he attacks the area with the most enemies using sword shock, dealing 170% damage to all adjacent enemies. The last hit of sword shock knocks the enemy up, and its damage dealt is increased to 250%.

upgrades.upgrade: Gains a Nectar Feast buff within the effect duration. Using this skill won't shorten its duration until the skill ends if Dionel has already been buffed.
Increases the damage of sword shock to 180% and the damage of its last hit to 260%.
The skill duration is extended by 2s if Dionel achieves an Assist or Kill, triggered only once per casting.
Increases the damage of sword shock to Ã— 190% and the damage of its last hit to 270%.

skill_1.name: Starry Void
skill_1.description: Passive: Dionel's normal attack turns into a Penetration attack, dealing 145% damage to all enemies along the way.

upgrades.upgrade: Increases the Penetration attack damage to 150%.
Flashes to a better attacking position if not in a good spot, triggered once every 6s.
Increases the Penetration attack damage to 155%.

skill_2.name: Nectar Feast
skill_2.description:
Passive: Dionel gains a stack of Intoxication when receiving the non-permanent stats boost from an ally, increasing 15% ATK and 15 ATK SPD up to 3 stacks, triggered once only by each ally,

Active: Dionel drinks the divine nectar to increase 20% ATK and 20 ATK SPD for 12s.

upgrades.upgrade: For each Intoxication stack, the ATK bonus is increased to 16%, and the ATK SPD bonus is increased to 16.
For each Intoxication stack, the ATK bonus is increased to 18%, and the ATK SPD bonus is increased to 18.
The bonuses from active casting are increased to 25% ATK and 25 ATK SPD.

hero_focus.name: Hero Focus
hero_focus.description: Dionel's normal attack permanently increases his ATK SPD by 3 during battle, for a maximum ATK SPD bonus of 30.

upgrades.upgrade: Dionel's normal attack permanently increases his ATK SPD by 4 during battle, for a maximum ATK SPD bonus of 40.
Dionel's normal attack permanently increases his ATK SPD by 5 during battle, for a maximum ATK SPD bonus of 50.

ex_skill.name: Celestial Spear
ex_skill.description: Dionel summons a light spear after a short delay, dealing 200% true damage to all enemies, up to 3 casting per battle. The skill is only available when the owned Intoxication is fully stacked.

upgrades.upgrade: Increases the skill damage dealt to 210%.

Deals extra true damage equal to 20% of the target's current HP when first casting the skill in a battle. Reduces target's Vitality by 60 in the next 8s. The extra damage is no more than 1000% of ATK.
Increases the skill damage dealt to 220%.

enhance_force.name: Enhance Force
enhance_force.description: Dionel increases Execution by 20 within the duration of Nectar Feast if it's been activated.

season_skill.name: Guardian Shield
season_skill.description: Gains a shield that absorbs 280% damage every 2s if HP drops below 30% in the first 15s of a battle. These shields can stack and remain effective until 15s into the battle.

upgrades.upgrade: Increases the shield value bonus gained every 2s to 290%.
Increases the shield value bonus gained every 2s to 300%.
Increases the shield value bonus gained every 2s to 310%.
Increases the shield value bonus gained every 2s to 320%.
Increases the shield value bonus gained every 2s to 330%.
Increases the shield value bonus gained every 2s to 340%.
Increases the shield value bonus gained every 2s to 350%.
